EmailTemplate.description: This is the last reminder, moves to stopped responding.
EmailTemplate.name: Sales - Meeting - No Show Follow-up #3
EmailTemplate.subject: Last contact
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Lead.FirstName},
Let me know if you are still interested in discussing CommCare and how we might collaborate. Here is a link to my schedule, I hope to hear back from you or see you on my calendar soon!
